generic.accessOrgAdmin: Only organization admins may perform this action!
generic.accessOrgAdminRoot: Only an organization admin from the parent organization may perform this action!
generic.accessRootOrg: This action can be performed only from the root organization!

errors.errorPageDescription: Our servers could not handle your request. Don't worry, our development team was already notified. Try refreshing the page.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.mentioned: You were mentioned in a comment!
notifications.newIntegration: A new integration has been added!

introduction.title: Welcome!
introduction.description: Analyze your ad performance effortlessly. With real-time data insights, track key metrics, optimize campaigns, and boost ROI. Get started now to unlock the full potential of your advertising strategy!
introduction.welcomeVideoDescription: In order to use AdsViewer you need to set up your integrations and set up your organization.

insights.title: Insights
insights.adPreviewsTooltip: Previews can be viewed only via filtering by Ad ID or Creative ID
insights.thresholdsDescription: You can set a custom range of min/max values for the selected metric that you're ordering by.

search.searchTermsHint: Start adding search terms to customize your search.
search.saveDescription: You're about to save this search configuration. Please decide if you want it saved for the entire organization or just you.
search.deleteDescription: You're about to erase this advanced search configuration. Please confirm your action to proceed.
search.saveAsNewUser: Save as new only for me

integrations.title: Integrations
integrations.description: Supercharge your work by connecting the tools you use every day to manage your advertisements in one place!
integrations.revokeWarning: You are about to perform a revoke action! Adsviewer will erase all your data related to this integration.
integrations.revokeTip: To confirm, type "REVOKE" in the box below.
integrations.tokenWarning: Integration token is close to expiration! Visit the Integrations page to extend!
integrations.tokenWarningExtend: Integration token is close to expiration and must be extended!
integrations.erroredIntegrationWarning: There is an error with this integration!
integrations.maxIntegrationsWarning: You have reached the maximum amount of integrations for your current plan.

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.messageHint: We value your feedback! Share your thoughts, suggestions, or issues with us here.
feedback.successMessage: Thank you for your feedback! Our team is carefully going to review and evaluate your comments.

authentication.resetLinkSent: We have sent a password reset link to your email
authentication.signUpEmailConfirm: Thank you for signing up! Please confirm your email to complete the registration process.

organization.title: Organization
organization.description: Exercise effective management over the operations and development of your organization.
organization.descriptionWarning: You currently don't have an active organization. Either switch to an organization or create a new one!
organization.addUsersHint: Add users from the current organization to your new organization and assign them new roles!
organization.addUsersNoUsersHint: The organization doesn't have any other members!
organization.deleteTip: To confirm, type "DELETE" in the box below.
organization.deleteWarning: WARNING: Adsviewer will erase all data related to this organization!
organization.inviteUsersLimitHint: You have reached the maximum amount of users for your current plan.

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: Manage your profile details to ensure all your personal information is up-to-date and accurately reflects your current status.
